alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Yellowstone National Park (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 2:14AM MST until December 24 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 9 inches, with the higher totals in the higher terrain. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains, Yellowstone National Park and Absaroka Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult over mountain passes. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka Mountains; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Yellowstone National Park
